education_text.0: Willem Adriaan Gerrit Anton ( ) Bouwman (born Tilburg, 1953) is a Dutch Information systems researcher, and professor at the   Willem Adriaan Gerrit Anton ( ) Bouwman (born Tilburg, 1953) is a Dutch Information systems researcher, and professor at the   Bouwman obtained his MA in political science at the      redirect    VU University Amsterdam VU University Amsterdam in 1979, his PhD at      Radboud University Nijmegen Radboud University Nijmegen, Faculty of Social Science in 1986,          and a degree in computer science at the      redirect    Open University in the Netherlands Open University in the Netherlands in 1992Bouwman started his career as assistant professor at the      University of Amsterdam University of Amsterdam in 1985Bouwman started his career as assistant professor at the      University of Amsterdam University of Amsterdam in 1985Bouwman was visiting professor at the      Syracuse University Syracuse University in 2004 and at the      Northwestern University Northwestern University in 2009Bouwman was visiting professor at the      Syracuse University Syracuse University in 2004 and at the      Northwestern University Northwestern University in 2009
